name: Bug of Windows 11 dev 22454 TaskBar Concept
description:
What happened

On Windows 11 dev 22454 version, the taskbar isn't aligned on center. Another unexpected bug. great job, Microsoft.

So why don't we make use of this blank space?

The Concept

I'd like to place a music control gadget there. In China, it could be the NetEase music app. I used its iPadOS screenshot for good looking and a song produced by Lay Zhang to present.

中文介绍

dev22454 版本出现了普遍的任务栏图标不居中 bug，看上去空落落的，不如放个音乐控制，加上浮动歌词充分利用空间。

其实用雨滴插件应该可以实现 80% 的效果，红心估计很难做到

如果有牛逼的开发看到，我很乐意提供切图并帮你完成后续设计。

目前仅发布在酷安 app Windows 11 话题板块。欢迎留言和 fork 我的设计，当然有人能开发出来更好了。
